Author: davidw
Content: You can be the sole owner of an LLC.

Author: davidw
Content: From what I read, non-US citizens/residents can't take part in S-corps, and since I am physically located in Europe, should I ever want to partner up with someone and include them in the company, perhaps it would be easier with the LLC.  It also seemed like a slightly lower hassle way of doing things.  I could be wrong, but in the end, after doing my reading, I just picked one and got on with it.
